exercise_answer: Exercise is important, especially for preventing cardiovascular diseases. Therefore, it is beneficial to engage in at least 150 minutes of exercise per week. Even a simple walk can help you take a step towards a healthier life in the future.
healthy_eating_answer: Healthy eating is about consuming an adequate and balanced diet. To ensure the regular and balanced functioning of the cells that make up our body, we should consume sufficient amounts of nutrients, including fats, carbohydrates, proteins, vitamins, and minerals.
mental_answer: Life is always filled with problems. Therefore, instead of exhausting ourselves with unsolvable problems, accepting them and learning to live with them brings peace, allows us to stay in the present moment, and makes life easier.
please_walk_everyday: Take outdoor walks whenever weather allows. Don't forget to protect yourself from sunlight. You can relax both physically and mentally by taking at least half an hour of brisk walking during the day.

diabet: Diabetes; It is a chronic disease characterized by high blood sugar levels. It occurs when the pancreas cannot produce the hormone insulin (Type 1 diabetes) or the body cannot use insulin (Type 2 diabetes). Insulin produced artificially to be used in the treatment is given to the patient in doses determined according to the sugar value in the blood. For this value measurement, it is measured either by bleeding the fingertip (in general, if the patient measures 7–8 times a day, he is faced with unbearable pain.) or it is measured with glucose sensors attached to the body.

answer_fourth: (ARGE) ekibi olarak kan insülin değerini ölçme konusunda çalışan bir grubu temsil ediyoruz. İnsülin, vücutta önemli bir rol oynayan bir hormondur ve kan insülin seviyelerinin doğru bir şekilde ölçülmesi, diyabet gibi birçok sağlık durumunun yönetimi için önemlidir. ARGE çalışmaları, yeni teknolojiler, test yöntemleri veya cihazlar geliştirerek kan insülin seviyelerinin etkili bir şekilde ölçülmesini sağlamayı amaçlar. Bu çalışmalar, insanların sağlık durumlarını izlemelerine ve gerekli tedbirleri almalarına yardımcı olabilir, böylece daha iyi bir yaşam kalitesi elde edebilirler.
